page.title: 14Beverstone Area:Roads.
page.content: The only main road in the area is the A.4135 which links Tetbury to the A.46.There are a number of minor roads.The narrow Hookshouse Lane winds its way from the outskirts of Tetbury to the village of Leighterton via the hamlet of Hookshouse.Another lane runs north from grid.ref.880932 and leads to the ancient Chavenage House.A number of routeways marked on the map have now become 'green lanes'.The lane which runs through farmland south from Beverstone to Hookshouse is passable in an ordinary car with extreme care in dry weather.Other routes such as Chavenage Lane which leaves the A.4135 at grid.ref.867935 are now impassable to ordinary cars.
